mapper.select: SELECT II.ITEM_NAME , II.ITEM_STANDARD , II.ITEM_SALES , TO_CHAR(RS.REC_DATE, 'MM-dd') AS REC_DATE , RSI.REC_AMOUNT , RSI.REC_MONEY , RS.REC_CODE FROM RECEIVE_STORE RS JOIN RECEIVE_STORE_ITEM RSI ON (RSI.REC_CODE = RS.REC_CODE) JOIN ITEM_INFO II ON (II.ITEM_NO = RSI.ITEM_NO) WHERE RSI.REC_CODE = '${ recCode }'
